name: Pesky Humans - Update 2 !
description:
The Game:

Pesky Humans is a 2D Spaceship shooter game. Your goal is rather simple, to annihilate all of mankind. The question is, will they kill you first?

Features:
  • There are multiple choices of ships to use.
  • Endless Mode - How long can you last?
  • Original Soundtrack. (Short, but more in the works.)
  • Different enemies to fight. (More to be added.)
WIP Features:
  • Campaign.
  • Upgrades for your ships.
  • New enemies.
  • Custom levels.
  • New player ships.
  • More music.
Changelog: 9/5/16 : Update 1
    • Fixed a bug where the game would crash upon the player dying.
12/27/16 - Update 2:
    • Added a new player ship. "Z3 - Alpha"
    • Added a new player ship. "Z3 - Beta"
    • Added a new player ship. "Annihilator"
    • Redone main menu.
    • New options menu.
    • Added a quit button to main menu.
    • Player can now choose ships before beginning.
    • Added endless mode (Currently only playable mode).
    • Added a gamemode select screen.
    • Removed original ship.
    • Music! (One track, but I made it myself!).
    • Jets now spawn only after player has reached score of 50.
    • Started work on endless mode getting progressively harder.
    • Fixed a bug where after moving too far in one direction the player's ships would overlap and become stuck.
    • Ships now loop around the map.
